divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and I were standing in the back of a bar where people were smoking cigarettes. My friend spots something in the sky. I look up, see a star with what looks to be a flying wing. It passed in front of the star and then continued traveling south. It was definitely real, my first UFO sighting.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Beaumont
There were no other sightings in Beaumont on or around October 20th 2007
